sentences.en: A lot of vegetables are grown , also sugarcane, sweet potatoes and ginger.
sentences.cn: 种很多蔬菜, 还有甘蔗, 番薯和生姜.

sentences.en: Agriculture: bananas, sugarcane, coffee, sisal; livestock; forest products; fish.
sentences.cn: 农业: 香蕉, 甘蔗, 咖啡, 波罗麻, 家畜, 森林产业, 渔业.

sentences.en: At El Awamia , just south of Luxor, I watched farmers harvest sugarcane.
sentences.cn: 在阿瓦米亚, 就是卢克索斯以南, 我看到农民们在收割甘蔗.

sentences.en: Brazilian sugarcane production and export volume rank the first in the world.
sentences.cn: 巴西甘蔗年产量和出口量均居世界首位.

sentences.en: He cut the sugarcane into several pieces.
High - quality products: sugarcane Ma pigs, highland cattle consumption , possessionmian yang.
sentences.cn: 名优特产: 蔗麻猪 、 高原耗牛 、 藏棉羊.

sentences.en: Mosaic is one of the most widely distributed sugarcane diseases.
sentences.cn: 花叶病是分布最广泛的甘蔗病害之一.

sentences.en: Plant waxes include carnauba wax candelilla wax and sugarcane wax used in polishes. About90% of the waxes in commerce are recovered by dewaxing petroleum.
sentences.cn: 植物蜡主要是巴西棕榈蜡，小烛树蜡和甘蔗蜡都用作擦亮剂。工业用蜡中约有90%是由石油中回收的。

sentences.en: Sugarcane and there were black sugar cane, Qingpi two varieties of sugarcane.
sentences.cn: 果蔗中又有黑皮蔗 、 青皮蔗两个品种.

sentences.en: Sugarcane was the best for its feeding, development and reproduction.
sentences.cn: 甘蔗最有利于该虫的取食 、 发育和繁殖.

sentences.en: Tall stalks of sugarcane bend in the trade winds.
sentences.cn: 高高的甘蔗在信风中弯下腰杆儿.

sentences.en: The  sugared  vinegar is  refined from the sugarcane and  pine.
sentences.cn: 加糖的醋是从甘蔗和松木中精炼出来的.

sentences.en: The sugared vinegar is refined from the sugarcane addp and pine.
sentences.cn: 加糖的醋是从甘蔗和松木中精炼出来的.

sentences.en: The sugared vinegar is refined from the sugarcane and pine.
sentences.cn: 加糖的醋是从甘蔗和松木中精炼出来的。

sentences.en: The suitable planting sugarcane area is vast in China.
sentences.cn: 摘要我国甘蔗的适种区域广阔.

sentences.en: There are vast fields of sugarcane in Queensland, Australia.
sentences.cn: 在澳大利亚昆士兰州有大片甘蔗田.

sentences.en: Tong, for the pressing of sugar cane, sugarcane available for direct fresh.
sentences.cn: 塘蔗用于榨糖, 果蔗可供人直接鲜食.

trans.tran_en: a tall tropical plant from whose stems sugar is obtained
